attributes.action: create an opposing petition on all petitions that attract more than 2 million signatures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition enables those people who do not subscribe to the petition “We petition the Prime Minister to be legally obliged to bring a bill before parliament for a free vote on all petitions which attract more than 2 million signatures” an opportunity to object to that petition in order to provide a balanced view on the subject.
